actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-102.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 94-380.

official_title: A bill to expend coverage of the Rehabilitation and Betterment Act (Act of October 7, 1949, 63 Stat. 724).

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-102) Requires that expenditures of funds hereafter specifically appropriated for rehabilitation and betterment of any project constructed under authority of the Small Reclamation Projects Act and of irrigation systems on projects governed by the Federal reclamation laws shall be made only after the organization concerned shall have obligated themselves for the return thereof, in installments fixed in accordance with their ability to pay, as determined by the Secretary of the Interior in the light of their outstanding repayment obligations. Provides that repayment of such loans made for small reclamation projects shall include interest in accordance with the provisions of said Small Reclamation Projects Act.

titles.title: A bill to expend coverage of the Rehabilitation and Betterment Act (Act of October 7, 1949, 63 Stat. 724).
